  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2403</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Finding correct position of an object in water -Refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtige Position einer Nachricht im Wasser 
finden - Brechung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvant la position correcte d'un objet dans 
l'eau - réfraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando a posição correta de um objeto na 
água - refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovando posizione corretta di un oggetto in 
acqua - rifrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρίσκοντας τη σωστή θέση ενός αντικειμένου στο ύδωρ 
- διάθλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encontrando la posición correcta de un objeto en
agua - refracción</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which shows refraction of light under water and how to determine the correct position of the object based on the light waves which are refracte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die Brechung des Lichtes unter 
Wasser zeigt und wie man die richtige Position der Nachricht 
feststellt, die auf dem Licht basiert, bewegt wellenartig, welche 
refracte sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui montre la réfraction de la 
lumière sous l'eau et comment déterminer la position correcte de 
l'objet basé sur la lumière ondule ce qui sont refracte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que mostre o refraction da luz sob a
água e como determinar a posição correta do objeto baseado na luz 
acenam quais são refracte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che mostra la rifrazione di luce 
sotto acqua e come determinare la posizione corretta dell'oggetto 
basato sulla luce fluttua quale sono refracte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που εμφανίζει διάθλαση του φωτός κάτω 
από το ύδωρ και πώς να καθορίσει τη σωστή θέση του αντικειμένου
βασισμένου στα φωτεινά κύματα που είναι refracte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que muestra la refracción de la 
luz bajo el agua y cómo determinar la posición correcta del objeto 
basaron en las ondas ligeras cuál es refracte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systeme optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema ótico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
